medium: Translucent white jade with traces of red pigment
title: Jade Pendant
description: Silhouette of a bird\'s profile with curved tail; incised lines to indicate the general features of the bird, identical design on both sides; small perforation at the curved neck of the bird pendant. White translucent jade; traces of red pigment; the back side of the pendant is calcified in ivory color; traces of woven texture is found in the back near the area of the bird\'s beak.
